page.title: 06MONSANTO CHEMICALS
page.content: This Plant was founded in 1867 by {Robert Ferdinand Graesser,a German chemist,to extract oils and wax from shale available from neighbouring collieries.It became{Monsanto's}first} investment outside the U.S. in 1920.A great number of people from the Garth & Trevor communities work there. Monsanto's Ruabon plant is on a steep hillside at{Cefn Mawr,eight miles south of{Wrexham}and 40 miles south of Liverpool.The plant is close to the {River Dee},overlooking the famous aqueduct built by{Thomas Telford}to carry the{Shropshire Union Canal}over the river. The history of the Ruabon plant as a manufacturing location is a long one. Today,about 40,000 tonnes of chemical products are dispatched from the plant each year and approximately {580 people work at the plant.
